name: Top Rated
body:
# Top Rated _LLC_
### The Northwest's Best Digital Design Company
Located in the heart of Wyoming, Top Rated is a digital design company specializing in high quality icons, avatars, themes, backgrounds and other digital media.

<iframe frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"width="300" height="200" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&q=30 N Gould STE 4000 Sheridan, WY 82801&ie=UTF8&t=roadmap&z=6&iwloc=B&output=embed">Map of 30 N Gould STE 4000 Sheridan, WY</iframe>

## Samples Of Our Work
The following represent some concept ideas we're working on for avatars that video game console owners could purchase. Many more to come. We contract artists to ensure a variety of styles.

### Horned One
![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/8948326/imgs/head.jpg)

### Burgers Are Good For You
![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/8948326/imgs/burger.jpg)

### Fox Mask
![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/8948326/imgs/mang.png)

## Artistic & Software Skills
* Illustrator
* Photoshop
* AutoDesk: Maya, Fusion 360, BIM
* Final Cut Pro
* Adobe Premiere
* After Effects
* Java
* XML
* Javascript / HTML / CSS

## About Us
Top Rated _LLC_ formed in 2016, but our team has over 30 years of combined experience designing marketable digital assets for commercial use. Our expertise includes software development, graphic design, 3D modeling, and visual effects.

## Contact Us
Got a great idea for an avatar? Want to work for a great company? Send your resume to [TopRatedDesignLLC@gmail.com](mailto:TopRatedDesignLLC@gmail.com)
